hero.title: Build Scalable Serverless Solutions Fast
hero.subtitle: AppsCode Inc. helps you design, implement, and optimize serverless architectures that scale effortlessly.

title_with_small_cards.title: Serverless Consulting Advantages
title_with_small_cards.subtitle: Why forward-thinking organizations choose AppsCode as their serverless partner:

service_details.title: Your End-to-End Serverless Consulting Partner
service_details.subtitle: From architecture to deployment, AppsCode helps you implement cost-efficient, scalable serverless solutions with minimal operational overhead.

sections.title: Serverless Consulting & Advisory
sections.description: Our experts guide you through adopting serverless architectures, helping you define the right strategy, minimize risks, and accelerate business outcomes.
offerings: Assess your unique requirements and design a tailored serverless roadmap to achieve organizational goals efficiently.
Deliver a detailed evaluation report highlighting benefits, trade-offs, and best practices before implementation.
Provide a clear, actionable development plan to ensure smooth adoption and measurable business impact.

sections.title: Professional Serverless Services
sections.description: We help you choose the optimal serverless stack, from AWS Lambda and Google Functions to leading OSS tools, and implement it for maximum impact.
offerings: Identify bottlenecks and design a customized deployment plan with expert guidance for seamless serverless adoption.
Receive unbiased recommendations grounded in real-world experience and industry best practices.
Minimize operational overhead so your team can focus on innovation and delivering value to customers.

sections.title: Enabling CI/CD
sections.description: We implement CI/CD pipelines tailored for serverless architectures, ensuring rapid, reliable, and automated delivery of your applications.
offerings: Build automated pipelines that streamline development and deployment of serverless applications.
Leverage experts experienced with AWS SAM, Google Cloud tools, and modern serverless CI/CD workflows.
Ensure high-quality applications with early error detection, full observability, and scalable operations.

sections.title: Serverless Managed Services
sections.description: Optimize your serverless applications with end-to-end monitoring, management, and performance tuning by AppsCode experts.
offerings: Gain deep observability into your applications to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
Proactively monitor application health to prevent downtime and maintain business continuity.
Let our experts handle CI/CD, monitoring, and operational tasks so your team can focus on innovation.
Unlock full potential of serverless applications for maximum business value.

sections.title: Serverless Training & Workshops
sections.description: Upskill your team with hands-on serverless training, ensuring they can operate, maintain, and optimize serverless environments effectively.
offerings: Implement best practices and foster a culture of serverless-first development within your organization.
Provide end-to-end guidance from function design to production deployment, turning your team into experts.
Enhance team productivity and close knowledge gaps with practical, scenario-based learning sessions.

cards.title: Why Choose AppsCode as Your Serverless Consulting Partner?
cards.subtitle: Leverage expert guidance and cloud-native experience to build stable, scalable, and cost-efficient serverless solutions.
